sqlGroup.name: info.notice
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT m.id, m.title, m.summary, m.publish_time, m.create_time, mu.name AS publisher, m.status -- @where FROM mo_notice m LEFT JOIN mo_user mu ON mu.id = m.publisher -- @condition WHERE m.delete_flag = ? ORDER BY top_flag DESC, order_no DESC, publish_time

SELECT m.id, m.title, m.summary, m.publish_time, m.create_time, mu.name AS publisher, (SELECT count(1) FROM mo_notice_view mnv WHERE mnv.notice_id = m.id AND mnv.user_id = ?) AS views FROM mo_notice m LEFT JOIN mo_user mu ON mu.id = m.publisher WHERE m.delete_flag = ? AND m.status = ? ORDER BY top_flag DESC, order_no DESC, publish_time LIMIT ?
SELECT * from mo_notice_view where notice_id = ? and user_id = ?
